website_summaries.verdict: The Sony E PZ 18-105mm F4 G OSS lens has a long zoom range and a power zoom design that's great for video, but it makes some optical compromises.

customer_reviews.title: Good for video, not for pictures: High border distortions, Low Contrast and Sharpness
customer_reviews.text: I returned this lens because its optical performance were too poor for high quality photography. Just acceptable in the middle of the focal length range (35-85mm) at f8 for video use but anyway with chromatic aberrations and contrast not comparable with prime lens. NB: this is not a G Master lens but a G lens (=cheap)
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Superb upgrade from the standard 16-50mm lens on Sony A6300
customer_reviews.text: Best lens I have ever bought for the Sony A6300, bulky compared wit the kit lens but a pleasure to use. Great Bokeh at f4 which was surprising, well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: billiedog

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable
customer_reviews.text: Constant f/4 from 18-105, you cannot go wrong, this is a great video and photo lens, I just want one that has a constant f/2.8 aperture, even if it costs 5 times more. At 105, you can get some great portraits with amazing bohka. and at 18 you can vlog for Youtube videos. This is one of the best all around lenses ever made. It's just a bit soft after about 24mm. also, vignetting is a bit much, but you can edit that out easily
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great standard zoom lens for a6000
customer_reviews.text: Very very good standard zoom lens for a6000. Sharp across the frame. Nice bokeh. Zoom by wire is OK though mechanical would have been better. Biggish, but I can drop down to the kit lens (which is ok) when required. Poor close-up distance, but a set of cheap closeup filter-lenses adds excellent occasional close-up ability. Happy with this. Sample
customer_reviews.author: Alan Hope

customer_reviews.title: A good lens for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I got to the point where I wanted more than what the kit lens could offer, and that’s exactly what I got with this. The glass quality is gorgeous and the consistent f/4 throughout the entire focal range of the lens is so incredible invaluable when shooting video. This lens lives on my a6300 now 80-90% of the time. Very impressed and happy with the value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Avalanche

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic versatile lens
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lens, as long as you know how to work the Sony focussing system. Produces great quality images, pin sharp with great bokeh. Focusses quickly and is easy to use. It's quite heavy and bulky, especially when paired with a small mirrorless body, but it's worth it for the versatility and quality it produces. It's a great option for if you only want to go out with one lens and shoot different scenes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Versatile lens
customer_reviews.text: As an all round lens it is great. On the A6000 and A6500 there is the option to zoom past the optical limit and engage electronic zoom up to 400 mm. (with a loss of focussing options), It has become my default generalist lens.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Green

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !!! Just what I needed 👍
customer_reviews.text: What a welcome addition to my collection, if you are after a multi purpose lens this is Brilliant for Landscapes, portraits, waterfall you name it , it’s a solid piece of kit the accompanies my Sony A6000 perfectly , so if your starting out GET it .. you won’t regret it 😎📷👍
customer_reviews.author: Grant Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for my photography hobby
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product - I take photos as a hobby so I’m not sure from a professional perspective how good this is, but certainly for me the quality is fab.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Not weather sealed, but great lens anyways.
customer_reviews.text: Really useful and great product. I chose not to get the kit lens and the 18-135mm. Reasons being one is a kit lens and the other seems inferior to this 18-105mm. The constant f4 was a plus point because I was looking to create videos while zooming and after many weeks of using, I really love this lens. To me, its the go-to lense if you only want one.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Best  Zoom  Lens for Aspc
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item from Amazon Warehouse. Mint comdotion. Amazing lens for Aspc. Sharpest at F5.6.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pinewood

customer_reviews.title: A good lens for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first lens, and I love it. A lot of reviews says it’s only good for video, but I’m using it for photos as well. I have taken some beautiful pictures with this lens. A right lens for beginners with F4.
customer_reviews.author: Tahir Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best travel lens for my Sony a6500 specially for photography.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Gurung

customer_reviews.title: Great lens for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp lens for the price . I'd say its one of Sony's better lenses for a crop frame camera . You cant go wrong really with this lens for the price .
customer_reviews.author: L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Ok but
customer_reviews.text: I like manual and have little control with this lens also like to go to low light its not sharp and shows
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sony Lens
customer_reviews.text: excellent price and a quality lens. Speedy and efficient delivery
customer_reviews.author: Mr P.A. ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Best budget zoom for videos
customer_reviews.text: Feels heavy and substantial. Focuses fast with my a6500, and is very good for videos. Edge to edge sharpness lacking for landscape photos, but good for portraits.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing bit of kit and it has improved my photography skills and the picture quality is incredible. It is very simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Anthony bc

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: All good, quick shipping and from the few use we had to far, it perfectly works.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A great documentary lens.
customer_reviews.text: Great stabilisation, the power zoom is a huge advantage. The image quality is as good as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Polarbear

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Video Lens
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant lens for video work. Has a fantastic focal length range. Light but built well.
customer_reviews.author: rusty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lens, very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic lens, very good quality, I did a test at the same focal , and this was way better. Pros have said the same , just wish it could be smaller. Steve
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet zooming, steady aperture, wide angle and telephoto capabilitie all in one!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a bigger aperture. I wish I had less grain on high iso settings.
customer_reviews.author: Michalis Michaelides

customer_reviews.title: Good all rounder
customer_reviews.text: For the money it is an awesome lens. Now it's not tack sharp like you would get from the higher class lenses but it's sharp enough if you're not a pixel peeper. The zoom is great and can be very precise if you're using it for video work. This is a great walk around lens and a good upgrade from the kit lens. Images attached are my own work taken with this lens on the Sony a6000
customer_reviews.author: Vallhalla81

customer_reviews.title: I had seen good reviews of this lens and decided to buy it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had seen good reviews of this lens and decided to buy it before my last holiday. It is really great, it fits nicely in your hand and balances the body nicely. It's very sharp with a nice bokeh at f4. It's a very usable range with the crop factor making it 27-158 as a walk around lens. It also stays the same length throughout the range. It's not cheap, but it is quality.
customer_reviews.author: Grampsie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lense!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this as I was not satisfied with the kit lense provided with the camera. I was thinking about Zeiss 16-70mm lense but after lot of research bought this lense. I took it to my tour in Scotland. I'm very pleased with the results and pictures were very sharp and clear. Only short coming is that it is bit heavy considering the size and weight of Sony A6000 camera. But overall considering the price and image quality it is an excellent choice. Never noticed distortion at any level of zoom. This lense will not probably come out of my camera ..
customer_reviews.author: Lasantha

customer_reviews.title: Image quality is good and it cover a very useful range
customer_reviews.text: Image quality is good and it cover a very useful range. The weight is ok, but size is a bit too long. Cannot say it is compact.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Leung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly absolutely fantastic image quality is better than expected
customer_reviews.author: Riyaz

customer_reviews.title: great lens in combination with my Sony A6000 compact
customer_reviews.text: would seem that even an idiot like me can work it ! Results surprisingly good (all on auto of course!). Haven't yet taken it off the A6000 compact which somewhat defeats the object of a compact camera I know. This combo seem highly recommended elsewhere online and on amazon. Portraits thus far seem to be its forte .... landscape, coastal and long shots at Wimbledon less impressive but that could be the camera or the operator rather than the lens. Now need to find a suitable case to protect the lens when I do take it off.
customer_reviews.author: beancounter

customer_reviews.title: Gone wrong
customer_reviews.text: This lens broke down in less than 9 months of use!! Impossible to find out how to get it repaired under warranty! I have learnt my lesson!!
customer_reviews.author: Dion Buhagiar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for Sony A6000 camera!
customer_reviews.text: THE lens to buy, for your Sony A6000! Results are exceptional and the zoom range for this APS-C sensor: 28 - 160 mm (approx) all at constant f4. Google this lens title and access full reviews, such as, DPReview. In short, I would highly recommend this lens as an all-round go-anywhere general purpose lens.
customer_reviews.author: Juan In'jun

customer_reviews.title: I did not buy this combo for photos, video only so I am giving it 5 stars based on video alone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought his for video on my a6300, it is a perfect partner on this body, the video quality, OSS and auto focus on both are a match made in heaven. I do not like the quality it gives my from its photos but I did not buy this combo for photos, video only so I am giving it 5 stars based on video alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you need an E mount zoom this is the one to get if on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best value zoom for the a6000. It's not perfect, and it's not in the same class as my canon lenses, nor my Sony primes, but as a cheap all rounder it's perfect. I keep looking at the 16-70 Zeiss but I can't see what that could possibly offer in terms of IQ over the Sony.
customer_reviews.author: dave_bass5

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: Love this lens on my Sony A6300. Picture quality is excellent and it hasnt been off my camera since i bought it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Corvo

customer_reviews.title: Very good image quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good image quality. The lens is a little bulky considering the small size of the nex and alpha series cameras but best of the available lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Clowes

customer_reviews.title: Super little lens Iam used to working with Nikon 2
customer_reviews.text: Super little lens Iam used to working with Nikon 2.8 lenses but they are getting to heavy for me to carry round anymore
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: Great sharp lens, works well with the Sony A6000 camera and Sony FS7 video camera. Light weight as well.
customer_reviews.author: Struan W.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time in perfect condition as mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in perfect condition as mentioned. Very happy with image quality, perfect for a6300 or a6500 with built in lens correction.
customer_reviews.author: ali rizvi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Lens
customer_reviews.text: Great lens for any e-mount system. I bought it to use with my Sony A6000 & having had the much more expensive Canon 24-105 f/4L lens in the past, i have to say this lens is on par with it. Like any zoom lens there is only slight softening of the extreme edges when shooting at 18mm, this is easily fixed in post editing software. Very quiet lens & the power zoom can actually be used in 3-speeds of Zoom which is fantastic. A great lens at a respectable price & i would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AndyK

customer_reviews.title: Great Lens
customer_reviews.text: Bloody love this lens. Great all-round lens for videography or photography. Good, sharp image, especially recording 4K on a 6500.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Carl Syres

customer_reviews.title: ... 200mm lens for my Sony A6000 and wanted a better quality lens for better results
customer_reviews.text: I had a 'cheap' 200mm lens for my Sony A6000 and wanted a better quality lens for better results. As some of the bigger lens' were out of my price range I opted for this one. I was prepared to take the hit on focal length, but I saw no jump in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth Bailey

product_meta.title: Sony E PZ 18-105 mm f/4.0 G | APS-C, Power Zoom Lens (SEL18105G)
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Camera LensThis G Lens for E-mount cameras delivers stunning still or movie imagery with the flexibility of 6X power zoom. Maximum aperture is a constant F4 from 18 mm wide angle to 105 mm medium telephoto, with high resolution and contrast throughout. A lever and ring on the lens barrel allow zoom speed to be freely adjusted as required while maintaining a sure, stable grip.Compatible models:NXCAM NEX-EA50JH, NEXEA50M, NEX-FS100J, NEX-FS700R, NEX-FS700RH, NEX-FS700U, NEX-FS700UK; XDCAM PXW-FS5, PXW-FS7, PXW-FS7K; α NEX 5R, 5RK, 5RL, 5RY, 5T, 5TY, 6, 6L, 6Y; α3000 ILCE-3000K; α7 ILCE-7, ILCE-7K; α7R ILCE-7R

BOX CONTAINS
Lens rear cap
Lens front cap
Hood (ALC-SH128)
feature_bullets: INCREDIBLY SHARP: An advanced optical design that incorporates two ED (Extra-low Dispersion) glass elements and three aspherical elements offers enviable G Lens image quality throughout the zoom range
BEAUTIFULLY SMOOTH BACKGROUNDS: Circular 7-blade aperture for beautiful bokeh defocus effects
CAPTURE ALL THE DETAIL: The zoom range and quality of this fine G Lens will be more than enough for most shooting situations, plus you have the added advantage of smooth power zoom

FAST AND PRECISE: Focusing benefits from the same type of pro-level technology, providing smooth, quiet operation that is also responsive. The length of the lens remains constant while zooming or focusing
PROFESSIONAL ERGONOMICS: Built-in Optical SteadyShot image stabilization compensates for camera shake that can blur images when shooting handheld

specifications.Included Components: HDMI micro cable, Rechargeable battery, AC adaptor, Manual, AC power cord, USB Connection Support cable
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars785 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
